attributes.action: Create an NHS Appreciation Bank Holiday.
attributes.additional_details: NHS staff work long hours and often witness people at their lowest.  The nation should be given the opportunity to thank the people who dedicate their lives to helping others.
attributes.background: Create an annual NHS appreciation National Bank Holiday held the Friday nearest the 21st June starting in 2021. Communities will recognise NHS staff for their selfless commitment to others and raise funds for preventative healthcare and wellbeing. National Health Solstice.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
